#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 int main()
 {
     int t;
     scanf("%d",&t);
     while(t--)
     {
         int x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4;
         scanf("%d %d %d %d",&y1,&y2,&y3,&y4);
         x2=y1+y4-y3;
         x3=y2-y1-y4;
         x4=y1-(x2+x3);
         x1=x4-x2-y3;
         printf("%d %d %d %d\n",x1,x2,x3,x4);
     }
     return(0);
 }
